channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Hot Mulligan – “Island In The Sun” (Feat. Free Throw’s Cory Castro)
item.description: 🔥 Hot Mulligan and Free Throw’s Cory Castro team up for a fresh take on “Island In The Sun”! 🌴🎶 #MusicCollab

item.title: Anysia Kym & Tony Seltzer Announce New Album Purity: Hear “Speedrun”
item.description: 🎶 Dive into the sonic world of Anysia Kym & Tony Seltzer with their electrifying new track "Speedrun" from the upcoming album Purity! 🔥 #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Lars Ulrich Confirms Metallica’s Interest in Sphere Residency, 2026 Super Bowl Halftime Show
item.description: 🤘 Metallica at the Super Bowl! 🏈 Who's ready for an epic halftime? 🎸 #Metallica #SuperBowlHalftime #2026SphereResidency

item.title: Wyclef Jean announces Blue Note Jazz Club residency
item.description: 🎷 Get ready for some smooth vibes! 🎶 @wyclefjean is taking over @BlueNoteNYC with his jazz residency! 🔥 #WyclefJean #JazzNights

item.title: Watch Jelly Roll Perform Power Ballad About His Online Haters
item.description: 🎤 Jelly Roll claps back at online haters with a powerful ballad! 🙌 Who else is feeling this fierce vibe? 🔥 #JellyRoll #MusicNews
